attributes.action: use any future bonus payments that might be  paid to CSA workers  to  compensate those who it has failed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By this I mean that compensation should be available to:- 
a) those resident parents who are entitled to Child Support that the CSA has failed to collect, thus causing  stress and  unnecessary hardship.
b) those absent parents for whom the CSA has made  incorrect assesments,  taken  wrong  payments, failed to respond to change of circumstances,  incorrectly  calculated  payments made etc,  thus causing  stress  and  often unnecessary hardship.
c)the children of those who have committed suicide as a result of the CSA's actions, who are therefore now not  getting the child support that they would otherwise be entitled to if the parent were still alive.
